authors.author: Daniel B. Towner William R. Newell

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Mercy there was great and grace was free; newline Pardon there was multiplied to me; newline There my burdened soul found liberty, newline At Calvary.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Years I spent in vanity and pride, newline Caring not my Lord was crucified, newline Knowing not it was for me He died newline On Calvary.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: By God's Word at last my sin I learned; newline Then I trembled at the law I'd spurned, newline Till my guilty soul imploring turned newline To Calvary.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Now I've giv'n to Jesus ev'rything; newline Now I gladly own Him as my King; newline Now my raptured soul can only sing newline Of Calvary.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: O the love that drew salvation's plan! newline O the grace that brought it down to man! newline O the mighty gulf that God did span newline At Calvary!
